name: RPi-Home Automation
tagline: This is a Homeautomationsoftware written in Python.
body:
### Welcome 
This is the result of a college project. 
Target was to deliver a fully automated home/office. 
As we had to use Raspberry Pi's we decided to go with Python for this job. 

### Authors on this code are:
@freshmosh
@tsuyochie

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
